FUNCTION count_bits(x) RESULT(cnt)
  INTEGER, INTENT(IN) : : x
  INTEGER :: cnt, i, mask
  cnt = 0
  DO i = 0, 31  ! since it's 32 bits
    mask = 1
    mask = mask << i
    IF (BTEST(x, i)) THEN
      cnt = cnt + 1
    END

        if (i == 0) then
